content: Running the test on my server today I can't see the test diagnostic information that used to be in there. has that been removed to see what was sent, and what was retrieved?
@Brian Postlethwaite No, that should still be visible. @Robert Scanlon can you check this out?

@Brian Postlethwaite I was able to track down the issue that you were seeing -- a subset of our tests were not saving requests/responses from to/from servers. That should be all set now. Sorry for taking so long to address this issue!
